references: J. Riordan, An Introduction to Combinatorial Analysis, Wiley, 1958, p. 142.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Sean A. Irvine, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
formula: G.f.: (1+S)/(1-S), where S = g.f. for A000084.
mathematica: n = 30; s = 1/(1 - x) + O[x]^(n + 1); Do[s = s/(1 - x^k)^Coefficient[s, x^k] + O[x]^(n + 1), {k, 2, n}] ; S = s - 1; CoefficientList[(1 + S)/(1 - S) + O[x]^n, x] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Feb 09 2016 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
